assignments.description: To continue the loop, subtract 1 from the number of schedules to create.
assignments.name: Add_Month_Subtract_Count
assignments.label: Add Month & Subtract Count

assignments.description: Assign a schedule item 1 month prior to the triggering Membership Contract Start Date to fill the gap in ACV with a $0 income schedule item.
assignments.name: Assign_1_Month_Prior_Schedule_Item
assignments.label: Assign 1-Month Prior Schedule Item

assignments.description: Assign the schedule item to the collection to be created.
assignments.name: Assign_1_Month_Prior_Schedule_Item_to_Collection
assignments.label: Assign 1-Month Prior Schedule Item to Collection

assignments.description: Assign a schedule item 2 months prior to the triggering Membership Contract Start Date to fill the gap in ACV with a $0 income schedule item.
assignments.name: Assign_2_Month_Prior_Schedule_Item
assignments.label: Assign 2-Month Prior Schedule Item

assignments.description: Assign the schedule item to the collection to be created.
assignments.name: Assign_2_Month_Prior_Schedule_Item_to_Collection
assignments.label: Assign 2-Month Prior Schedule Item to Collection

assignments.name: Assign_Count_of_Current_Schedule_Items
assignments.label: Assign Count of Current Schedule Items

assignments.name: Assign_Count_of_Other_Schedule_Items
assignments.label: Assign Count of Other Schedule Items

assignments.name: Assign_Final_Schedule_Item_to_Collection
assignments.label: Assign Final Schedule Item to Collection

assignments.description: Assign an Income Schedule Item's values.
assignments.name: Assign_Income_Schedule_Item
assignments.label: Assign Income Schedule Item

assignments.description: Assign the number of schedules to be created and assigns the schedule date for the first schedule item.
assignments.name: Assign_of_Income_Schedule_Items
assignments.label: Assign # of Income Schedule Items

assignments.description: Even though the collection filter kept only 1 Membership Contract, this is still a record collection and we need to grab the individual record from it with a loop.
assignments.name: Assign_Other_Membership_Contract
assignments.label: Assign Other Membership Contract

assignments.description: Even though the collection filter kept only 1 Income Schedule Line Item, this is still a record collection and we need to grab the individual record from it with a loop.
assignments.name: Assign_Other_Schedule_Item
assignments.label: Assign Other Schedule Item

collectionProcessors.description: Sort the collection by End Date and filter only to the single most recent Membership Contract.
collectionProcessors.name: Sort_Other_Membership_Contracts
collectionProcessors.label: Sort Other Membership Contracts

collectionProcessors.description: Sort the Income Schedule Items by Date and filter to the most recent one.
collectionProcessors.name: Sort_Other_Membership_Income_Schedule_Items
collectionProcessors.label: Sort Other Membership Income Schedule Items

decisions.description: Check if there are more schedule items that need to be created.
decisions.name: Create_Schedule_Item
decisions.label: Create Schedule Item?

decisions.description: Check if the most recent Income Schedule Item is within 2 or 3 months of the current Membership Contract's start month.
decisions.name: Is_Date_Within_1_or_2_Months_of_Membership_Contract
decisions.label: Is Date Within 1 or 2 Months of Membership Contract?

decisions.description: Determine whether any income schedule items were already created on this Membership Contract.
decisions.name: Is_there_already_an_income_schedule
decisions.label: Is there already an income schedule?

decisions.description: Check if any Membership Contract data was changed during the flow and needs to be updated on the record.
decisions.name: Membership_Contract_Updated
decisions.label: Membership Contract Updated?

decisions.description: Check the Membership Duration to determine if it needs to be updated. The Expected Number of Schedules formula outputs the Difference in months between the End Date and Start Date; if the End Date is on the last day of a month, add one to the result.
decisions.name: Need_to_Check_Membership_Duration
decisions.label: Need to Check Membership Duration?

decisions.description: Check if there was an Income Schedule for the other Membership Contract.
decisions.name: Were_Schedule_Items_Found
decisions.label: Were Schedule Items Found?

rules.name: Yes_at_Least_1_Schedule_Item_Found
rules.label: Yes, at Least 1 Schedule Item Found

formulas.description: Creates a Date Value by subtracting a month from the Year and Month of the Membership Contract Start Date and setting to 1st day of month.
formulas.name: f_1_Month_Schedule_Item_Date

formulas.description: A Screen Flow bug displays dates a day early, so this adds 1 to the date for within-flow display purposes.
formulas.name: f_1Mo_Schedule_Item_Date_Plus_1

formulas.description:
Creates a Date Value for the 2-Month-Prior Income Schedule Item if a 2 month gap is found between contracts.
YEAR: Year of the Start Date minus 2 months MONTH: Subtracts 2 from Start Month DAY: always on the 1st of the month
formulas.name: f_2_Month_Schedule_Item_Date

formulas.description: A Screen Flow bug displays dates a day early, so this adds 1 to the date for within-flow display purposes.
formulas.name: f_2Mo_Schedule_Item_Date_Plus_1

formulas.description: Total Value divided by (Membership Duration * 12) to get the annual contract value. The IF statement uses the record's Membership Duration or the provided Membership Duration (if it was changed in the first screen).
formulas.name: f_ACV_Snapshot

formulas.description: Formula to determine the difference between the End Date and Start Date in months.
formulas.name: f_Difference_in_Months

formulas.description:
Formula that will reflect TRUE if the End Date is on the last day of the month.
If End Date is in December, checks if the End Date = 12/31, Otherwise, check if End Date = the result if you subtract 1 from the first of the next month.
formulas.name: f_End_Date_is_Last_Day_of_Month

formulas.description:
Outputs the number of Income Schedule Items we should expect to see:
Shows the difference in months between the Membership Contract Start Date and End Date. Add 1 if the End Date is on the last day of the month.
formulas.name: f_Expected_Number_of_Schedule_Items

formulas.description: Formula to set the Schedule date of the first schedule in the batch, based on the Start Date of the Membership Contract (landing on the 1st of the month).
formulas.name: f_First_of_the_Start_Month

formulas.description:
Formula to determine the Income for all Income Schedule Items except the Final Income Schedule Item.
Round the result to 2 decimals: Total Value divided by the Membership Duration (as provided in screen or from the Membership Contract).
formulas.name: f_Income

formulas.description:
Uses different Income based on the Record Type Id of the triggering Membership Contract:
Subscription Membership Contracts: Outputs the income as determined by {!f_Income}.
Other Record Types (including Program Membership Contracts): Outputs $0 Income.
formulas.name: f_Income_by_record_type

formulas.description:
Uses different Final Income calculation based on the Record Type Id of the triggering Membership Contract:
Subscription Membership Contracts: Outputs the Final Income Schedule Item income determined by {!f_Income_Final_Schedule_Item}.
Other Record Types (including Program Membership Contracts): Outputs $0 Final Income.
formulas.name: f_Income_Final_Schedule_by_Record_Type

formulas.description: Determines the amount of the Final Income Schedule Item by subtracting the sum of all prior schedule item income from the Total Value of the Membership Contract.
formulas.name: f_Income_Final_Schedule_Item

formulas.description: Generates the URL of the triggering Membership Contract.
formulas.name: f_Link_to_Membership_Contract

formulas.description: Generates the URL of the "Other" Membership Contract. (The Other Membership Contract is used to determine if a 1 or 2 month gap between Membership Contracts exists.)
formulas.name: f_Link_to_Other_Membership_Contract

formulas.description: Outputs the Membership Duration (whether provided in Screen Input or from the Membership Contract).
formulas.name: f_Membership_Duration

formulas.description: Outputs the Month of the "Other" Membership Contract's most recent Schedule Date. (The Other Membership Contract is used to determine if a 1 or 2 month gap between Membership Contracts exists.)
formulas.name: f_Month_of_Other_Schedule_Item

formulas.description: Adds 1 Month to the Schedule Date to generate the date of the next Income Schedule Item in a loop.
formulas.name: f_Next_Month

formulas.description: Displays the Number of Schedule Items based on the Membership Duration (whether provided in Screen Input or from the Membership Contract).
formulas.name: f_Number_of_Schedule_Items

formulas.description: Outputs the Start Date minus 90 Days. Used in a GET Element to search for "Other" Membership Contracts.
formulas.name: f_Start_Date_Minus_90

formulas.description:
Subtracts 2 from the Start Month of the Membership Contract.
Used in a search for 1 Month gap between Membership Contracts.
formulas.name: f_Start_Month_Minus_2_Months

formulas.description:
Subtracts 3 from the Start Month of the Membership Contract.
Used in a search for 2 Month gap between Membership Contracts.
formulas.name: f_Start_Month_Minus_3_Months

formulas.description: A Screen Flow bug displays dates a day early, so this adds 1 to the date for within-flow display purposes.
formulas.name: f_var_Schedule_Item_Date_Plus_1

Flow.interviewLabel: Membership Contract - SF - Create Income Schedule {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Membership Contract - SF - Create Income Schedule

recordCreates.description: Create the Income Schedule using the collection of Income Schedule Items.
recordCreates.name: Create_Income_Schedule
recordCreates.label: Create Income Schedule

recordLookups.description: Pull any Membership Income Schedule Items already related to this record. If so, we do not want to create duplicate Income Schedule Item.
recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Income_Schedule_Items
recordLookups.label: Get Current Income Schedule Items

recordLookups.description: Get the Income Schedule Items from the Other Membership Contract record.
recordLookups.name: Get_Other_Income_Schedule_Items
recordLookups.label: Get Other Income Schedule Items

recordLookups.description: See if there are other membership contracts of this type, and if so, we want to fill any potential 1 or 2 month gaps in ACV.
recordLookups.name: Get_Other_Membership_Contracts_of_this_Type
recordLookups.label: Get Other Membership Contracts of this Type

recordRollbacks.name: Roll_Back_Schedule_Membership_Contract_Updates
recordRollbacks.label: Roll Back Schedule & Membership Contract Updates

fields.name: Display_Text_Preview_Income_Schedule
fields.fieldText:
Previewing Income Schedule for:


Membership Contract: {!var_Membership_Contract.Name}

Membership Duration: {!f_Membership_Duration}

Start Date: {!var_Membership_Contract.Start_Date__c}

End Date: {!var_Membership_Contract.End_Date__c}


Total Value: {!var_Membership_Contract.Total_Value__c}

Current ACV: {!f_ACV_Snapshot}

fields.name: Display_Text_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Review for accuracy and then click Continue.


You can make adjustments to these income schedule items after creation, if needed (including adding or deleting them).

fields.name: Display_Text_Added_0dollar_Income_Schedule
fields.fieldText: Note: Added $0 Income Schedule Item(s) from prior Membership Contract {!var_Other_Membership_Contract_Record.Name} with {!var_Other_Membership_Contract_Record.End_Date__c} End Date.

fields.name: Display_Text_Sum_of_Income_Schedules
fields.fieldText: Sum of Income: {!var_Sum_of_Income}

fields.name: Display_Text_Oops_Field_Missing
fields.fieldText:
Oops! Missing fields that are required to create Income Schedule Items.


Please correct any missing fields below:

fields.name: Display_Text_Error_Creating_Schedule
fields.fieldText:
Oops! There was an error creating the Income Schedule. Details below:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Display_Text_Error_Updating_Membership_Contract
fields.fieldText:
Oops! There was an error updating the Membership Contract. Details below:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Display_Text_Oops_Schedules_Created
fields.fieldText: Oops! This Membership Contract already has an Income Schedule.

fields.name: Display_Calculated_Membership_Duration
fields.fieldText:
Calculated Membership Duration: {!f_Expected_Number_of_Schedule_Items}


Note: The Membership Duration determines the number of income schedule items created, rounded down if the duration is not a whole number.

fields.name: Display_Text_Start_End_Date
fields.fieldText:
Start Date: {!var_Membership_Contract.Start_Date__c}

End Date: {!var_Membership_Contract.End_Date__c}

fields.name: Display_Text_Success
fields.fieldText: Success - Membership Income Schedule Created!
